text.title: Yak Network Map
text.intro: The Yak Network Map displays shared domain-interests among active yaks, to encourage new 1:1 connections. Learn more about this project in the #yak-network-map channel on the Yak Collective Discord server.
text.more:
Hover on a node to see its connections (visible nodes); the rest of the map will get hidden.

Node color signifies the openness of the node (yak) for receiving DMs:

Green: DMs open for collaboration opportunities.
Yellow: DMs open for starting conversation.
Blue: Prefer to not receive unsolicited DMs.

Thick edge signifies multiple shared-interests between yaks.

Additional SVG graphics provided by Hero Patterns.
